title: Resolution Order Item
description: An item in the resolutionOrder array. Can be a reference to a named set or modifier, or an inline set or modifier definition with required type and name properties.

oneOf.description: Reference to a named set (#/sets/...) or modifier (#/modifiers/...)

type.description: Must be 'set' for inline set definitions

name.description: Unique name that must not conflict with any other name in resolutionOrder

oneOf.description: Inline set definition with type and name

type.description: Must be 'modifier' for inline modifier definitions

name.description: Unique name that must not conflict with any other name in resolutionOrder

oneOf.description: Inline modifier definition with type and name
